subject: [Radiance-general] 2007 Workshop talks onlin
body:
Hi All,

Thanks to everyone who attended and presented for making this year's
workshop such a success!  Special thanks to Katja Doerschner and the
UMN Digital Technology Center for hosting us.

Daniel Fuller has made the talks available on <www.radiance-online.org>:

http://www.radiance-online.org/radiance-workshop6

The tar file of the entire CD of talks (about 650 MBytes) can be
downloaded for the moment from:

http://radsite.lbl.gov/greg/RadWorkshop2007.tar

Under Unix, you can try using "curl":

curl http://radsite.lbl.gov/greg/RadWorkshop2007.tar | tar xf -

Best,
-Greg
